description: Name of the Enrolling Doctor
If enrolled by GP = name of GP clinic else blank
If enrolled by another place (outpatient clinic, municipality, pharmacy) = name of another place else blank
Name of the current GP of the patient. Manual entry of current GP if change in GP since enrollment else same as Name_Enrolling_GP.
If not enrolled by WebReq = name of submitter (if manual GP registration, outpatient clinic, municipality, pharmacy)  else blank
Date of DD2 Examination
If WebPatient = date of consent given, if others = date of online registration completed (dd-mm-yyyy)
If WebPatient = date of patient part of questionnaire completed, if others = date of online registration completed (dd-mm-yyyy)
If WebPatient = date of full questionnaire completed, if others = date of online registration completed (dd-mm-yyyy)
If Webpatient = blank, if manual submittion = date of manual entry (dd-mm-yyyy)
Social Security Number (CRP number) of the Patient (ddmmyy-xxxx)
Social Security Number (CPR number) without hyphen (ddmmyyxxxx)
Birth date (dd-mm-yyyy)
Current age (birth date subtracted today in years and months - 12 months = 1 ; 6 months = 0,5 ; 3 months = 0,25)
Age at enrollement (birht date substracted Date_Consent in years and months - 12 months = 1 ; 6 months = 0,5 ; 3 months = 0,25)
Gender divided into Kvinde = female / Mand = male
First name(s) of the patient
Family name of the patient
E-mail adress of the patient
Phone number of the patient
Manual entry of current healthcare provider number if change in GP since enrollment else same as Healthcare_Provider_Number_Enrollment
If WebReq = automatically enrolling healthcare provider number, others = manual entry, else blank
Name of the Service Provider
Region
Enrollment via WebReq (Ja=yes, Nej=no)
Comments
